mod_application: Have you ever moderated or helped manage another clan or community?
Are there any areas of the clan you're especially interested in supporting?
How comfortable are you with using moderation tools on discord and in game and are there any tools you'd want training on?
event_coordinator: Have you ever helped run or organize events in another clan or community?
Do you have any experience with using Discord tools (e.g., bots, embeds, event posts)?
